title: type ID Martin Gropius Bau Berlin
content:
I am trying to find this font but wasn't abel to ID it myself. I thought URW Grotesk but the f seems different. Thank you so much for support.

comments.content: Does anyone know which font this might be?
Best site ever here for Type ID. Thank you so much. I know lineto type foundry but did not look there... thanks again Jan!

There's a lot more than type IDs here though!
